idea:
Wernear.com is a platform for the restaurant to present their food for the customers who love ordering the food from the nearby restaurants.
And the restaurant has to pay fixed lowest commission regardless of the order amount.
name: weRnear

idea:
MasterMyLife EQ Education (MML) is an innovative educational enterprise that has launched the World's first Master's degree program in Emotional Intelligence & Life Coaching / Human Relations in collaboration with the University of Mumbai's GICED.

MML has been founded by an industry veteran, Mr. Hemant Lawanghare with the purpose of promoting life skills integrated higher education.

MML has designed & developed a world-class curriculum of UG, PG & Diploma programs focused on Industry need & overall competency development of students, along with extensive Industry interface.

MML's offers all its programs in collaboration with the progressive Universities & Management Institutes.

MML has structured programs in the domains of Life Coaching, Human Relations, Learning & Development, Key Account Management, Corporate Strategy, Corporate Communication, Entrepreneurship & Family Business Management, Digital Business, Project Management, Lean Management, CSR, Corporate Compliance & Ethics, Social Entrepreneurship, and, Emotional Intelligence.
name: MASTERMYLIFE EQ EDUCATION
